data.actual_result: You don't join the voice channel, and the top channel appears blank and you can't load messages, and any messages you send will disappear until you switch channels
data.expected_result: You join the voice channel, and see the messages in the top channel
data.short_description: When using an voice channel invite link to a server you're in, it doesn't put you in the voice channel, and you're unable to see any of the messages in the top channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite link to a voice channel for a server you're in - Send the invite in another server or DM so that it isn't in that channel - Completely close and restart the app after going to the second channel - Reopen Discord to the channel where you posted the invite link - Tap on the "Joined" button to enter the server you made the invite for - Observe the server after you get moved to it - Attempt to send a message, and observe what happens - Note: On desktop, you're given the option to load more messages, but that option is missing on iOS
